name: gatsby-starter-default
description: A simple starter to get up and developing quickly with Gatsby
author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

scripts.header_apidocs:
echo "---
title: "Document Store"
metaTitle: "Database"
metaDescription: ""
slug: "/docs/apidatabase"
date: "2020-09-03"
id: "apidatabasemd"
---

# Document Store

$(cat ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/document_store.md)" > ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/document_store.md && echo "---
title: "File Converters"
metaTitle: "File Converters"
metaDescription: ""
slug: "/docs/file_converters"
date: "2020-09-03"
id: "file_convertersmd"
---

# File Converters

$(cat ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/file_converter.md)" > ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/file_converter.md  && echo "---
title: "Preprocessor"
metaTitle: "Preprocessor"
metaDescription: ""
slug: "/docs/apiindexing"
date: "2020-09-03"
id: "apiindexingmd"
---

# Preprocessor

$(cat ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/preprocessor.md)" > ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/preprocessor.md && echo "---
title: "Reader"
metaTitle: "Reader"
metaDescription: ""
slug: "/docs/apireadermd"
date: "2020-09-03"
id: "apireadermd"
---

# Reader

$(cat ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/reader.md)" > ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/reader.md && echo "---
title: "Retriever"
metaTitle: "Retriever"
metaDescription: ""
slug: "/docs/apiretrievermd"
date: "2020-09-03"
id: "apiretrievermd"
---

# Retriever

$(cat ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/retriever.md)" > ./src/pages/docs/site/en/api/api/retriever.md
scripts.update_tutorialsdocs: wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/tutorials/tutorials/1.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/1.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/tutorials/tutorials/2.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/2.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/tutorials/tutorials/3.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/3.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/tutorials/tutorials/4.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/4.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/tutorials/tutorials/5.md  -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/5.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/tutorials/tutorials/6.md  -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/6.md
scripts.header_tutorialsdocs: sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/1.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/1.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/2.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/2.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/3.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/3.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/4.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/4.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/5.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/5.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/6.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/tutorials/tutorials/6.md
scripts.update_usagedocs: wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/roadmap.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/roadmap.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/database.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/database.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/domain_adaptation.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/domain_adaptation.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/intro.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/intro.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/reader.md -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/reader.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/retriever.md  -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/retriever.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/terms.md  -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/terms.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/tutorials.md  -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/tutorials.md && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepset-ai/haystack/master/docs/_src/usage/usage/get_started.md  -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/get_started.md
scripts.header_usagedocs: sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/roadmap.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/roadmap.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/database.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/database.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/domain_adaptation.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/domain_adaptation.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/intro.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/intro.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/reader.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/reader.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/retriever.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/retriever.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/terms.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/terms.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/tutorials.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/tutorials.md && sed -i 's/<!---/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/get_started.md && sed -i 's/--->/---/' ./src/pages/docs/site/en/usage/usage/get_started.md
scripts.update_img: wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/annotation_tool.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/annotation_tool.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/code_snippet_usage.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/code_snippet_usage.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/colab_gpu_runtime.jpg -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/colab_gpu_runtime.jpg && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/haystack_logo_blue_banner.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/haystack_logo_blue_banner.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/haystack_logo_blue_banner_social_media.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/haystack_logo_blue_banner_social_media.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/logo.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/logo.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/retriever_reader.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/retriever_reader.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/search.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/search.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/sketched_concepts_white.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/sketched_concepts_white.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/zenhub_board.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/zenhub_board.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/zenhub_issue.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/zenhub_issue.png && wget https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/raw/roadmap/docs/_src/img/zenhub_roadmap.png -O ./src/pages/docs/site/en/img/zenhub_roadmap.png
scripts.update_deploy: npm run update_img && npm run update_apidocs && npm run header_apidocs && npm run update_tutorialsdocs && npm run header_tutorialsdocs && npm run update_usagedocs && npm run header_usagedocs && gatsby build && gh-pages -d public -b master
